K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:223b-1: a'a yu: pa t'i ya th'a k'a ro pa ri pri tsatsha s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:223b-3: tshe 'pho ba ji ltar 'gyur pa zhus pa'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-1: sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-3: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po ser skyar khyim bdag thams cad 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-4: de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par gshegs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-5: de'i tshe sh'akya dga' skyes zhes bya ba dar la bab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-6: gnyen gyi skye po thams cad la rab tu gces pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-7: mi thams cad kyis bkur ba'i gnas su gyur pa zhig tshe 'phos pa'i phung po'i drung na de'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-9: g-yog 'khor rnams kyis rta'i tshogs dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-15: shel la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'ang bsags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-17: btung ba ro zhim po mngar ba sna tshogs pa'ang bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-18: smre sngags 'don cing dga' skyes la gsol lo zhes mchod pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-19: rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-20: 'di ltar tshe 'phos pa la mchod cing gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-21: rjed pa ni bram ze dag gi smrang las zer na 'di dag la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224a-22: bde ba ci yod pa bcom ldan 'das la dri'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-1: sems can tshe 'phos pa ji ltar 'gyur ba'i don zhu bar 'tshal na skabs dbye bar ci gnang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-6: ci bzhed pa zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-7: rgyal po chen po'i sems rangs par bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-8: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-9: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po zas gtsang mas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-11: 'jig rten 'di nas tshe pha rol tu 'phos pa'i sems can rnams pha rol tu skye ba de lha rnams kyang lhar skye'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-15: dmyal ba rnams kyang mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-18: dmyal ba rnams su tshe 'phos par rigs ma 'dres par so sor skye'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-21: lha rnams nas tshe 'phos pa mi la sogs pa gzhan rnams su skye'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-25: dmyal ba rnams nas tshe 'phos na'ang lha la sogs pa gzhan rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-28: sems can thams cad 'di nas tshe 'phos nas ye med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-29: me shi ba'i thal ba bzhin du gyur nas skye bar ye ma mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:224b-32: sems can thams cad 'di nas tshe 'phos nas pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-1: mes la sogs pa thog ma med pa nas bzung ba'i bar du brgyud pa'i ris mthun pa rnams 'jig rten pha rol tu skye ba mi len par 'dir ci spyad pa bzhin 'grogs te gnas so zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchis na de ltar lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-4: 'di na phyug dregs rgyags pa rnams pha rol tu'ang phyug dregs rgyags par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-5: 'di na dbul rgud nyam chung ba rnams pha rol tu'ang dbul rgud nyam chung bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-6: 'on te de gnyis mi 'dra bar phan tshun bsnol mar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-10: glang po che la sogs pa zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-14: btung ba dang ldan pa rnams shi 'phos nas pha rol tu'ang de bzhin du zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-16: za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de ltar lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-19: 'di nas shi 'phos pa la pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-21: bu la sogs pa nye ris rnams kyi bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-22: btung ba nyung du nyung dur gtang ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225a-23: bsngos pa'ang bskal pa mang po'i bar du zad par mi 'gyur bar za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de ltar lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-0: sems can 'di nas tshe 'phos pa @225b na pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-2: bu la sogs pa la gtam byas te tshig ci smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-3: gzugs byad ci 'dra ba dag tshe 'phos nas phyis pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-5: bu la sogs pa la sngon tshe ma 'phos pa'i dus na gtam byas pa la sogs pa smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-8: thos pa yod ces 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de ltar lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-12: 'di nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams lhar skye ba la sogs pa 'dri ba de ltar ma lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-13: lha rnams tshe 'phos pa'ang lhar skyes nas 'gro ba ris gzhan rnams su mi skye ba lags pa nas de bzhin du mi la sogs pa 'gro ba gzhan rnams kyang tshe 'phos nas 'gro ba gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-14: gzhan rnams su mi skye bar rang rang gi snga ma'i ris rnams su skye ba lags na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-16: mi rnams dang po lha las gyur pa lags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-17: ngan song gsum po rnams ni mi rnams kyis mi dge ba spyad pa las gyur pa lags pa'i phyir gang lha la sogs pa tshe 'phos pa de 'gro ba ris gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-18: gzhan rnams su skye ba lags so; ;kye rgyal po chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:225b-20: rgyal po chen pos gsungs pa ltar lags na ni da ltar gyi 'gro ba ris drug po rnams mang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-0: nyung ba rnams ji ltar yod pa bzhin du dus @226a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-1: thams cad du de ltar 'gyur ba'i rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-2: mi rnams las mi dge ba spyad pa mang pa'i rgyus ngan song gsum po rnams phyir zhing mang ba la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-5: da ltar gyi dgra bcom pa 'di dag ni mi las gyur pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-6: 'gro ba ris so sor ma 'dres bar yang ris so sor skye ba ni mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-7: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par yang mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-9: de'i phyir na las dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-10: mi dge ba'i dbang gis mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-11: ngan song la sogs par ris tha dad par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-13: rgyal po chen pos lha rnams tshe 'phos nas mi la sogs pa gzhan rnams su skye'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa dris pa ni de de bzhin lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-16: rgyal po chen pos sems can thams cad tshe 'phos nas ye med par gyur te me shi ba'i thal ba bzhin du skye ba ye ma mchis sam zhes gsungs pa ni de ltar ma lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-19: sa bon yod na 'bras bu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-20: tshe 'di sa bon lta bu las tshe phyi ma 'bras bu lta bu yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226a-21: kye rgyal po chen po; nyi ma shar nas khad kyis nub ste smag tu gyur pa las yang nang par 'char ba bzhin du tshe 'di 'phos nas yang skye ba phyi ma len no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-0: tshe 'phos nas phyi mar @226b skye ba ye ma mchis na 'gro ba rnams zad pa'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-3: shing rnams kyang dus kyi dbang gis bskams pa de'ang phyir skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-4: de bzhin du sems can rnams las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-5: nyon mongs pa dus 'gyur ba dang 'dra ba'i dbang gis skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-7: de'i phyir na rgyal po chen po tshe phyi ma nges par yod par mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-9: rgyal po chen pos sems can thams cad 'di nas tshe 'phos nas pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-11: yang mes la sogs pa thog ma med pa nas bzung ba'i bar du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ris mthun pa rnams 'jig rten pha rol na skye ba mi len par 'di na ci spyod pa bzhin 'grogs te gnas so zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-16: bu la sogs pa gcig la gcig snang pa ni gzugs dngos po can gcig la gcig snang gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-17: sems gcig gis gcig mthong ba ni ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-18: gzugs kyi phung po 'dir zhig ste med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-19: pha rol na sems gcig la gcig ji ltar snang ste 'grogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:226b-22: yang mes la sogs pa da ltar tshe ma 'phos pa'i bu tsha gzugs yod pas kyang mi mthong na pha rol tu tshe 'phos pa'i lus med pas pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-0: yang sems la sogs pa gzugs med pa ji ltar mthong nas @227a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-6: spun mang po 'grogs pa'i dus na'ang gzugs so sor snang ba las ma gtogs pa rang gi sems kyang rang gis mi mthong na spad dang spun gyi sems gcig gis gcig lta ga la mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-7: tshe 'phos nas ji ltar mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-10: mes po dang; yang mes la sogs pa ji ltar snang nas 'grogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-12: thog ma med pa'i dus na de bas snga ba med pa'i mes po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-13: da lta'i bu tsha rnams pha rol na 'grogs na da ltar mi'i rus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-16: ris mi gcig pa tha dad pa mang po ji snyed pa rnams so sor dgrar gyur pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-20: cha lugs ma thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-21: ma mthong ba dag kyang thog ma mes po gcig las gyes pa yin na da ltar spad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-23: mes po la sogs pa 'grogs mi 'grogs kyi mtshams spun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-25: dang po mes po nas bzung ste da ltar spun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-26: spad kyi bar du brgyud pa rnams kyang da ltar gyi spad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-27: spun 'dra bar so so na brtse zhing gdung bar 'dran gang gang ni 'grogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227a-29: da ltar gyi mi rnams so so nas bdag cag gi mes po 'di yin no zhes phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-0: bdag cag @227b 'di dang pha gcig gi bu'o zhes phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-1: ris su bcad na de dag gis mes po zhes so sor bzung ba de kun gyi yang pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-4: zhes mes nas dang po'i mes po la thug gi par du brgyud pa ni da ltar so sor na bdag cag gi mes po zhes bzung ba yin na 'jig rten pa dag smra ba ltar 'di nas tshe 'phos nas skye ba mi len par pha rol na spad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-5: spun 'grogs na da ltar rus rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-7: dgrar gyur pa kun kyang phyogs gcig nas 'grogs dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-9: da ltar gyi tshe 'di gzugs can dngos por snang ba'ang mun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-10: phag na 'dug pa dag gcig gis gcig mi mthong na tshe 'phos pa'i sems gzugs med pas gcig gis gcig ji ltar mthong nas 'grogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-12: da ltar gyi sems can gzugs dang ldan pas kyang mi mthong ba'i gnas yul mi gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-13: gnas tha dad pa dag la rang gi gzugs snang bar ston mi nus na tshe 'phos nas ji ltar gzugs snang bar ston nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-15: 'jig rten pa kha gcig gis grags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-16: rnyed pa dag btsal ba'i phyir bzlas pa'i gtam gyis gzhan slu bar byed pa la gsan par mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:227b-18: rgyal po chen pos 'di na phyug dregs rgyags pa rnams pha rol tu'ang phyug dregs rgyags par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-1: chung ba rnams pha rol tu'ang dbul rgud nyam chung bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-2: 'on te de gnyis mi 'dra bar phan tshun snol bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-4: sems can rnams tshe ma 'phos pa'i skye ba 'di la'ang la la skyes ma thag tu phyug dregs rgyags par gyur pa las lo lnga bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-5: drug cu nas 'khogs pa'i bar du dbul rgud nyam chung ba'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-6: la la skyes nas gzhon dar ba'i tshe la dbul rgud pa las lo lnga bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-7: drug cu nas 'khogs pa'i bar du phyug dregs rgyags pa dag yod na tshe 'phos nas phyug dbul mi rtag pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-11: shing la sogs pa dro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-12: rlan pa'i rkyen tshogs pa'i tshe ni lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-14: grang zhing rlan med pa'i rkyen gyis bskam par 'gyur ba bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis ni phyug dregs rgyags par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-16: ser sna'i dbang gis ni dbul rgud par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-18: sbyin pa rgyun ma chad pas tshe rabs nas tshe rabs su phyug dregs rgyags pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-20: sbyin pa la 'gyod pa byas pas tshe 'ga' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-21: tshe stod smad la dbul rgud pa'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228a-22: dus thams cad du rku 'phrog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-0: ser sna dag la gnas pas tshe rabs nas tshe rabs su @228b dbul rgud pa'ang yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-2: ser sna la 'gyod pa byas pas tshe 'ga'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-3: tshe stod smad la phyug dregs pa'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-5: sbyin pa'i rkyen gyis dbul rgud pa'ang mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-6: ser sna'i dbang gis phyug dregs pa'ang mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-8: dbul rgud pa 'di gnyis tshe snga phyi la rje ba'ang ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-10: rgyal po chen pos 'di na rta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-11: glang po che la sogs pa zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-15: btung ba dang ldan pa rnams tshe 'phos nas pha rol tu 'ang de bzhin du zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-17: za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchi na de de ltar lags sam zhes gsungs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-19: mi rnams tshe 'phos pa'i tshe las dge sdig gang spyad pa bzhin mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-20: ngan song dag tu skye ba len te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-22: 'jig rten pa dag mchi ba ltar ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-23: tshe 'phos pa 'di'i cha lugs ltar snang ba ni bar snang gi khams 'di na dri za'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthar thug pa med pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-24: dri za 'chi ka ma'i sems la nye bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rigs yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-25: des dri za'i zas btsal ba'i phyir tshe rabs snga ma'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-28: cha lugs lta bu dag sprul par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:228b-29: tshe 'phos pa de'i cha lugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-1: byed cing sprul pa ston pa'ang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-4: dri za las ma gtogs pa gzhan yang gnod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-6: 'byung po la sogs pas tshe 'phos pa'i pha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-8: spun la sogs pa bslu ba'i phyir mi ma yin pa de yis 'jig rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis tshe 'phos pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-10: lo rgyus dag shes par byas nas mi ma yin pa de'i byin gyis pha ma la sogs pas mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-11: rmi lam du 'byung ba yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-15: spun la sogs pa yun ring por lhan cig pa'i bag chags rtas pas mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-16: rmi lam du snang ba'ang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-18: mi zhig gis da ltar tshe ma 'phos pa'i rang gi pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-21: gzhan su'ang rung ba dag dang 'grogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-24: 'thab rtsod la sogs pa bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-25: sdug bsngal gang yang rung ba dag rmis na mi des rmis pa bzhin du gang rmis pa'i pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229a-28: gzhan su'ang rung ba rmi lam na snang ba des tshor ba yod na ni rmis pa de bden pa yin na des rmis pa'i pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-0: gzhan su'ang rung ba rmi lam na snang ba de bden par @229b ji ltar bzung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-2: tshe ma 'phos pa'ang gcig gis rmis pa gcig gis mi tshor na tshe 'phos pa'i rmis pa tshe 'phos pa de yin par ga la 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-3: bag chags rtas pa yin no; ;kye rgyal po chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-4: bag chags lags pa'i dpe ni gzhan yang mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-5: mi zhig sngon tshe stod la mchis pa'i mkhar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-7: grong gang yin pa zhig bor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-8: yul gzhan zhig tu tshe smad la 'dug pa na sngon gyi grong de'ang zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-9: sngon mi 'dra ba las mi des sngon gyi khang ba'i dbyibs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-10: rgya ci 'dra ba ma zhig pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-11: ma 'drams pa rmis na grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-12: khang pa de la sems yod na ni khang pa des sems snang du rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-14: grong des rdo bems po yin na mi des rmis pa de ci'i phyir bag chags rtas pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-15: de bzhin du tshe 'phos pa'i dan rtags dang bcas pa'ang khang pa ma zhig pa rmis pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-16: tshe 'phos pa'i sems kyang las gar mthun par skye ba blangs zin na de snang du btub bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-18: de'i phyir bag chags mthu rtas pa'i dbang gis tshe 'phos pa'i gtan tshigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-21: de bzhin du ral gri la sogs pa'i go mtshon thogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-23: rgyan la sogs pa gyon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-25: glang po che la sogs pa zhon par snang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-26: rmi lam du 'byung ba'ang bag chags snang ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:229b-27: khang pa'i dpe bzhin du rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-1: rgyal po chen pos 'di nas shi 'phos pa la pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-3: bu la sogs pa nye ris rnams kyis bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-4: btung ba nyung du nyung ngur gtang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-5: bsngos pa'ang bskal pa mang po'i bar du zad par mi 'gyur bar za zhing 'thung ngo zhes 'jig rten pa dag mchis na de ltar lags sam zhes gsungs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-7: gling bzhi pa nas stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis kham sang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad na bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-11: btung ba nyung ngu nyung dus dus thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-12: bskal pa mang por za ba'i sems can gzigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-15: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la ci bsams pa'i 'dod pa 'byung ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la yod pa'ang sngon bskal pa mang por bsod nams kyi tshogs med pa bsags pa las byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-17: glo bur du byung ba ni ma yin na bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-18: btung ba nyung ngu de bskal pa mtha'i bar du mi zad pa de rigs lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230a-20: tshe ma 'phos pa'i pha spad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-0: sbun gcig la gcig 'brel bar 'dzin pa phan par 'dod pa rnams da ltar ma @230b shi pa lus dang ldan pa'ang gcig yul gzhan du song na de la pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-2: spun gang yang rung bas zas skom mang por sbyin no gsol lo zhes bsngos pa'ang yul gzhan du song ba'i rmi lam du'ang mi 'byung na dngos por za zhing 'thung ba lta ga la yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-3: tshe 'phos nas lus dang bral ba la bsngos shing gtad pa za zhing 'thung ba lta ga la yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-5: tshe 'phos nas sems lus dang bral ba des bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-6: spun la sogs pas gtad pa'i zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-7: skom dngos po can 'di dag sems dngos po med pa gzugs med pas ji ltar bdag po byed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-10: bca' ba ni lus yod pa'i yan lag gi rtsol ba la rag lus na sems la lus kyi yan lag de'i rtsol ba yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-11: rgyal po chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-13: de ltar lags na tshe 'phos pa la 'di na phun 'dogs pa'i bza' btung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-16: rgyan gtong ba 'di dag la don ma mchis pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:230b-19: tshe 'phos pa des las gang spyad pa'i rnam par smin pas 'gor ba ris tha dad pa gnag du skye ba len pa de la mi dge ba dang ma 'brel ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba'i las dge ba sna tshogs pas bstangs na mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-0: gal te skye ba blangs pa zhig la @231a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-1: bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i las dge ba zhig gis bstangs na skye ba blangs pa des nor rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-3: 'dod pa'i longs spyod 'phel ba dang 'gro ba gzhan thams cad kyis mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur ba'i phan pa yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-4: tshe 'phos pa skye ba mi len par gshin gyi 'jig rten yod nas bza' btung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-7: rgyan dag bdag por byed pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-9: 'jig rten pa dag gang gis mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-10: pha ma la sogs pas rmi lam du rmis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-11: tshe 'phos pa las bsngos pas gshin de bza' btung gis mgu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-14: rgyan thogs so zhes smra zhing de ltar snang ba de'ang bza' btung gis mi mgu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-17: rgyan mi thogs so zhes smra zhing de ltar snang ba dag dri za 'chi ka'i sems la nye bar 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-18: mi ma yin pa dag gis de ltar snang bar byed pa yod do; ;kye rgyal po chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-19: rgyal po chen pos sems can dag 'di nas tshe 'pho kha na pha ma'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-21: bu la sogs pa la gtam byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-23: gzugs ci 'dra ba dag de tshe 'phos nas phyis pha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231a-25: bu la sogs pa la de sngon tshe ma 'phos pa'i dus na gtam byas pa la sogs pa smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-0: de @231b lta bu mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-1: ston pa yod ces 'jig rten pa dag mchi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-3: ma lags zhes gsungs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-5: smra ba ni lus yod pa'i kha lce la brten nas smra ba lags na tshe 'phos pa'i lus ni 'dir bzhag na sems gzugs med pa de ji ltar smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-6: de ste shi ba de la lus yod do zhes zer ba ni skye ba blangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-7: de la pha ma dgos pas gshin gyi 'jig rten yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-9: de lta bu'i tshe ma 'phos pa'i mtshan ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-10: dan rtags 'jig rten pa gang dag smra ba ni dri za khyab byed ces bya pa'i rigs yod pas byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-13: klung yangs pa dag tu dus gcig tu rlung ldang ba bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba thams cad kyi sems la khyab par byed pa'i rigs dri za pi tsa na zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-14: gnod sbyin smra 'dod kyi rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-15: 'byung po bar hi ni ta kun tu rtogs 'dod ces bya ba dag gis bsgrubs nas mi ma yin pa de dag gis shi ba des sngon ji ltar gtam byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-16: cha lugs kyi dan rtags dag 'jig rten pa dag bslu ba'i phyir ston cing smra ba dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-17: de'i tshe lhas byin de na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa de la yid ma ches nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:231b-19: sems can tshe 'phos nas cir 'gyur ba'i dan rtags pha rol na yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-0: med pa bka' stsal pa de goo @232a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-1: ta mas thog ma su la gsan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-2: dus nam gyi tshe mkhyen par mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-4: mkhyen par mdzad pa'i grogs po ni su lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-8: ngas ni rang gi lus btang ba la sogs pa dka' ba mang po dag bskal pa grangs med par spyad de sgrib pa thams cad ni sbyangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-9: tshogs chen po yang dag par bsags pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-10: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-11: da ltar gyi dus na phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa na shes bya gang dag ci yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-12: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i shes bya thams cad la mi mkhyen par gyur pa gang yang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-14: dzambu'i gling 'dir nyi ma shar ba de khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-15: rim gyis shar ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-16: dus gcig tu gsal bar shar ba bzhin du shes bya thams cad skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa'i phyir nga ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-17: de skad ces bka' stsal pa la'ang lhas byin yid ma ches nas thams cad mkhyen pa mnga' ba de nyams sad pa'i phyir dzambu'i gling 'di na shing gi rigs tsan dan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232a-19: seng ldeng la sogs pa shing tha dad pa brgya stong bye ba dag bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-0: so sor bsregs nas thal ba'i phur ma byas nas rang gi mi @232b nor bar bya ba'i phyir thal ba la shing gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-1: gang gi ming yi ger btags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-3: bcom ldan 'das khyod la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-5: 'di shing gang gi thal ba lags zhes mthar chags su thal ba'i phur ma thams cad bstan pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gang gi thal ba yin pa ma nor bar 'di ni tsan dan gyi thal ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-7: 'di ni seng ldeng gi thal ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-8: zhes thal ba'i phur ma thams cad ma nor bar bshad pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-10: bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bar yid ches bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-11: tshe 'phos pa cir 'gyur ba gsungs pa bden par bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-12: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-13: bcom ldan 'das ni kun mkhyen lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-14: shing mang thal ba'i bye brag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-15: ma gzigs ma gsan nges bar mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-17: zhes bstod nas spobs pa med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-18: de'i tshe sh'akya ming chen de na 'dug pas tshe 'phos pa cir 'gyur ba bka' stsal pa la yi dam ches nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:232b-20: tshe 'phos pa'i sems can rnams cir 'gyur ba gsungs pa de mngon sum du gzigs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-0: @233a *// 'on te gzhan zhig la gsan pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-1: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-4: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mi gzigs pa ni 'jig rten na med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-5: skyu ru ra rlon pa lag mthil du bzhag na lag pa'i bye brag thams cad gsal ba de bzhin du dus gsum gyi shes bya la ngas ma gzigs pa ci'ang mi mnga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-6: thos pa la brten pa ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-8: sh'akya ming chen gyis thams cad gzigs pa de bden rdzun nyams sad pa'i phyir ser skya'i grong khyer chen por song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-9: khyim ji snyed yod pa la 'bras kyi phur ma re re blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-10: rang gis 'bras kyi phur ma mi gang la blangs pa mi nor bar bya ba'i phyir sh'akya gang la blangs pa'i ming rnams bris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-11: 'bras phur ma'i nang du bcug nas 'bras kyi phur ma glang po che'i khal longs pa gcig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar song ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad gzigs na 'bras kyi phur ma 'di dag mi dbye bar sh'akya gang gang gi 'bras gang gang lags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig ces gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233a-16: glang po che'i khal gyi 'bras kyi phur ma rnams drung du bzhag pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras kyi phur ma re re blangs @233b shing 'di sh'akya dga' byed kyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-2: 'di sh'akya 'dod sred kyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bras phur ma re re la sh'akya 'di yi'o zhes ming ma nor par rim par rdzogs par gsungs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis thams cad gzigs pa la sh'akya ming chen la sogs pa thams cad yid ches te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe 'phos pa cir 'gyur ba bshad pa ni nges so snyam nas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-5: sangs rgyas spyan gyis thams cad gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-6: 'jig rten pa ltar rdzun mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-7: sh'akya'i grong khyer ji snyed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-8: 'bras kyi phur ma ma nor mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-9: sems can tshe 'phos pha rol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-10: ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten rdzun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-12: kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-13: ces bstod nas spobs pa med de mi smra bar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-14: de nas yab rgyal po chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-16: sems can gang dag gis mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i las mi dge ba dag bgyis pas de'i rnam par smin pa mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba dag gis ji ltar bgyis na bde ba thob par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:233b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-0: sems can gang dag gis mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i las mi dge ba byas pa dag gis sgyu med pa'i @234a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-1: sems dang bas rnam par smin pa la yid ches par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-2: sems thag pa nas bshags na 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-3: 'chi ba'i tshe mi dge ba sngar byas pa dag la 'gyod pa bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol na sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-6: mtho ris su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro; ;tshe phyi ma med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-7: skye ba len pa ni dbang phyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-9: gyin la sogs bdag gis byed par mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-11: 'khor ba thams cad la chags par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-13: 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'pho ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-14: skye ba len pa na rtag pa 'pho ba'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-15: chad pa 'gags te med pa'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-16: rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-17: rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-18: byed pa pos byas pa'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-20: nyon mongs pa'i rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las skya bar blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-21: rgyal po chen pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-23: sems can rnams tshe 'phos nas skye ba len pa de de ltar rtag pa'ang mi 'pho /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-26: byed pa pos yang ma byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234a-27: 'jig rten pha rol tu skye ba'ang 'grub pa de rtogs par dka' na 'di la mthun pa'i dpe mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis @234b bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234b-2: 'di la mthun pa'i dpe brgyad yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-072-008:234b-3: bla mas kha ton brjod pa slob mas shes pa'i dpe dang /
